price: E eles dizem: "Que se faça descer sobre ele sinais de seu Senhor!" Dize, Muhammad: "Os sinais estão, apenas, junto de Allah, e sou, apenas evidente admoestador."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyātun min rabbihi qul innamā al-āyātu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
